General.Name: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Public Joint-Stock Company Territorial Generation Company No.2 does not have significant operations. Previously, it was engaged in the production and sale of electricity and heat, and steam and hot water in the Northwestern and Central Federal districts of Russia. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Yaroslavl, Russia.

1.Title: Director of Economics & Fin., Chief Accountant & Deputy Chairman of the Management Board
